form.label: Azure Alerts
form.description: Service Security Posture Hardening Programme : v1.0

search.query: | inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map.csv | search ssphp_resource_group!="mc*" | stats values(ssphp_service_name) as ssphp_service_name by ssphp_business_service_index | table ssphp_service_name, ssphp_business_service_index | dedup ssphp_service_name | sort 0 ssphp_service_name
| inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map where ssphp_business_service_index=$tkn_service_id|s$ | dedup ssphp_subscription | table ssphp_subscription, ssphp_subscription_display_name
| inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map where (ssphp_business_service_index=$tkn_service_id|s$ AND ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription|s$) | dedup ssphp_resource_group | table ssphp_resource_group
| inputlookup ssphp_resource_service_map where ssphp_business_service_index=$tkn_service_id|s$ | dedup ssphp_service_team | table ssphp_service_team | sort 0 ssphp_service_team

| rest splunk_server=local /services/authentication/current-context
```| eval roles=if(username="ian.pearl@education.gov.uk",mvappend("sc_admin", "power", "dfe_ssphp_service_power", "dfe_ssphp_service_user_s184"),roles)``` ```override for testing```
| rex field=roles "^dfe_ssphp_service_user_(?<role_service>s\d{3})$" | eval isadmin=case(roles="sc_admin","1",roles="power","1",roles="dfe_ssphp_service_power",1,isnotnull(role_service),"0",1==1,"0")
| lookup ssphp_resource_service_map ssphp_business_service_index as role_service OUTPUT ssphp_service_name | eval ssphp_service_name=mvdedup(ssphp_service_name), role_service=if(isadmin="1","*",role_service), ssphp_service_name=if(isadmin="1","ALL",ssphp_service_name)
| table roles, isadmin, username, role_service, ssphp_service_name

| makeresults | eval "Number of Alerts"=$eventcount_tkn$, "Number of Alerts"=if(isnum('Number of Alerts'),'Number of Alerts',"N/A") | fieldformat "Number of Alerts"=tostring('Number of Alerts',"commas") | table "Number of Alerts"

| inputlookup ssphp_last_ssphp_drop.csv | search ssphp_source="alerts" | rename last_SSPHP_RUN as SSPHP_RUN
| eval search_earliest=SSPHP_RUN-3600, search_latest=SSPHP_RUN+3600 | eval "Last Alerts Ingestion Time from Azure"=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | table "Last Alerts Ingestion Time from Azure", SSPHP_RUN, search_earliest, search_latest

table.fields: "Last Alerts Ingestion Time from Azure", SSPHP_RUN

search.query:
$tkn_index$ $tkn_sourcetype$ $tkn_host$ $tkn_source$ SSPHP_RUN=$ssphp_run_tkn|s$
| rex field=ssphp_resource_id "resource(G|g)roups\/(?<ssphp_resource_group>[^\/]+)\/" | fillnull value="-"
| lookup ssphp_resource_service_map ssphp_resource_group AS ssphp_resource_group OUTPUT ssphp_business_service_index AS ssphp_business_service_index ssphp_environment AS ssphp_environment ssphp_location AS ssphp_location ssphp_parent_business AS ssphp_parent_business ssphp_portfolio AS ssphp_portfolio ssphp_product AS ssphp_product ssphp_service AS ssphp_service ssphp_service_line AS ssphp_service_line ssphp_service_name AS ssphp_service_name ssphp_service_offering AS ssphp_service_offering ssphp_service_shortname AS ssphp_service_shortname ssphp_service_team AS ssphp_service_team ssphp_tech_contact_email AS ssphp_tech_contact_email ssphp_tech_dir_arch_partner AS ssphp_tech_dir_arch_partner ssphp_tenant AS ssphp_tenant ssphp_tenant_name AS ssphp_tenant_name ssphp_subscription as ssphp_subscription
| where ssphp_start_time_epoch>$time_window_earliest_epoch$ AND ssphp_start_time_epoch<$time_window_latest_epoch$
| eval sev_sort=case(ssphp_severity="High",1,ssphp_severity="Medium",2,ssphp_severity="Low",3,1==1,4) | sort 0 sev_sort, ssphp_status, ssphp_start_time_epoch
| search ssphp_business_service_index=$tkn_service_id$ ssphp_subscription=$tkn_subscription$ ssphp_resource_group="$tkn_resource_group_id$" ssphp_severity=$tkn_severity$ ssphp_environment=$tkn_environment$ ssphp_service_team=$tkn_service_team$ ssphp_status=$tkn_status$
| table ssphp_alert_id, ssphp_severity, ssphp_alert_name, ssphp_tenant_name, ssphp_subscription, ssphp_resource_group, ssphp_resources_affected, ssphp_alerts_meta_entities, ssphp_start_time, ssphp_status, ssphp_alert_description, ssphp_business_service_index, ssphp_environment, ssphp_service_team
| rename ssphp_severity as "Severity", ssphp_alert_name as "Alert Name", ssphp_tenant_name as "Tenant", ssphp_subscription as "Subscription", ssphp_resource_group as "Resource Group", ssphp_resources_affected as "Affected Resources", ssphp_alerts_meta_entities as "Alert Entities Affected", ssphp_start_time as "Activity Start Time", ssphp_status as "Status", ssphp_alert_description as "Alert Description", ssphp_business_service_index as "Business Service Index", ssphp_environment as "Environment", ssphp_service_team as "Service Team"
| eventstats count

table.fields: "Severity","Alert Name","Tenant","Subscription","Resource Group","Affected Resources","Alert Entities Affected","Activity Start Time","Status","Alert Description","Business Service Index","Environment","Service Team"
